description: Primary key for audit logs table
name: id

description: ID of the user who performed the action
name: user_id

description: Timestamp when the action was performed
name: created_at

description: Hex color code for the category
name: color

description: Timestamp when the category was created
name: created_at

description: ID of the post this comment belongs to
name: post_id

description: ID of the user who wrote the comment
name: user_id

description: ID of the parent comment for nested comments
name: parent_id

description: Whether the comment has been approved by moderators
name: is_approved

description: Timestamp when the comment was created
name: created_at

description: Timestamp when the comment was last updated
name: updated_at

description: Primary key for constraint variations table
name: id

checkConstraints.checkClause: CHECK (((animal)::text = ANY ((ARRAY['cat'::character varying, 'dog'::character varying, 'bird'::character varying, 'fish'::character varying])::text[])))

description: Primary key for enum tests table
name: id

checkConstraints.checkClause: CHECK (((priority)::text = ANY ((ARRAY['low'::character varying, 'medium'::character varying, 'high'::character varying, 'critical'::character varying])::text[])))
CHECK (((color)::text = ANY ((ARRAY['red'::character varying, 'green'::character varying, 'blue'::character varying, 'yellow'::character varying])::text[])))
CHECK (((category)::text = ANY ((ARRAY['electronics'::character varying, 'clothing'::character varying, 'books'::character varying, 'home-garden'::character varying])::text[])))
CHECK (((direction)::text = ANY ((ARRAY['north'::character varying, 'south'::character varying, 'east'::character varying, 'west'::character varying])::text[])))
CHECK (((task_status)::text = ANY ((ARRAY['todo'::character varying, 'in-progress'::character varying, 'done'::character varying, 'cancelled'::character varying])::text[])))

CHECK (((weekday)::text = ANY ((ARRAY['monday'::character varying, 'tuesday'::character varying, 'wednesday'::character varying, 'thursday'::character varying, 'friday'::character varying, 'saturday'::character varying, 'sunday'::character varying])::text[])))

description: Size of the file in bytes
name: file_size

description: Number of times file was accessed
name: access_count

description: Primary key for geographic data table
name: id

description: Timestamp when data was last updated
name: last_updated

description: Timestamp when inventory was last updated
name: updated_at

description: Primary key for network logs table
name: id

description: Primary key for order items table
name: id

description: ID of the order this item belongs to
name: order_id

description: ID of the user who placed the order
name: user_id

description: Number of views for the post
name: views

description: Array of tags associated with the post
name: tags

description: Timestamp when the post was published
name: published_at

description: Timestamp when the post was last updated
name: updated_at

description: Primary key for time series table
name: id

description: Primary key for user sessions table
name: id

description: ID of the user this session belongs to
name: user_id

description: Timestamp when the session was created
name: created_at

description: Timestamp when the session was last used
name: last_used_at

description: User agent string of the client
name: user_agent
